Class Tetromino

java.lang.Object
application.model.tetromino.Tetromino
public class Tetromino extends Object
Represents the currently active (falling) tetromino piece on the board.

Stores the piece's type, position (row, col), and current rotation state. The Board uses this information for collision detection and rendering. This class has zero JavaFX imports — pure model, fully testable.

  • Constructor Details

    • Tetromino

      public Tetromino(TetrominoType type, int row, int col)
      Creates a new tetromino at the given position with rotation 0.
      Parameters:
      type - the tetromino type
      row - the starting row (top-left corner)
      col - the starting column (top-left corner)

    • Tetromino

      public Tetromino(TetrominoType type, int boardCols)
      Creates a new tetromino at the default spawn position. Spawns at row 0, centered horizontally based on piece width.
      Parameters:
      type - the tetromino type
      boardCols - the number of columns on the board (for centering)

  • Method Details

      public TetrominoType getType()
      Returns the type of this tetromino.

      public int getRow()
      Returns the current row position.

    • getRotation

      public int getRotation()
      Returns the current rotation state (0–3).

    • getCurrentShape

      public int[][] getCurrentShape()
      Returns the 2D shape matrix for the current rotation state. This is a defensive copy — safe to modify.
      Returns:
      the current shape matrix

    • moveDown

      public void moveDown()
      Moves the piece one row down.

    • moveLeft

      public void moveLeft()
      Moves the piece one column to the left.

    • moveRight

      public void moveRight()
      Moves the piece one column to the right.

    • moveUp

      public void moveUp()
      Moves the piece one row up (used to undo a moveDown on collision).

    • adjustCol

      public void adjustCol(int delta)
      Adjusts the column position (used for wall kicks after rotation).
      Parameters:
      delta - the number of columns to shift (positive = right, negative = left)

    • adjustRow

      public void adjustRow(int delta)
      Adjusts the row position.
      Parameters:
      delta - the number of rows to shift (positive = down, negative = up)

    • rotateClockwise

      public void rotateClockwise()
      Rotates the piece clockwise (rotation state: 0 → 1 → 2 → 3 → 0).

    • rotateCounterClockwise

      public void rotateCounterClockwise()
      Rotates the piece counter-clockwise (rotation state: 0 → 3 → 2 → 1 → 0).

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition(int row, int col)
      Sets the position explicitly. Used for testing and spawn adjustments.
      Parameters:
      row - the new row
      col - the new column
